Changelog
=========

1.0 (2011-08-09)
----------------
- i18n support
- English and Spanish translation
- Full layout now displays related items
- Full test

1.0dev (2011-03-24)
-------------------

- Initial release
- Patches for Products.Collage.browser.controlpanel.CollageSiteOptions
  enabledType and enabledAlias
- 2 views to support nested Collage: full and content
